summary: Brutish, fortune-hunting scoundrel Petruchio tames his wealthy, shrewish wife, Katharina.
cast: Elizabeth Taylor|Richard Burton|Cyril Cusack|Michael Hordern|Alfred Lynch|Alan Webb|Giancarlo Cobelli|Vernon Dobtcheff|Ken Parry|Anthony Gardner|Natasha Pyne|Michael York|Victor Spinetti|Roy Holder|Mark Dignam|Bice Valori|Tina Perna|Alberto Bonucci|Milena Vukotic|Alfredo Bianchini|Valentino Macchi|Roberto Antonelli|Salvatore Billa|Lino Capolicchio|Liana Del Balzo|Gianni Magni|Michael Wilding Jr.|Christopher Edward Wilding

title: La mujer indomable
